game_description: Didimo makes user-generated 3D digital humans--fast, high-fidelity, at runtime-- from a 2D selfie in under 2 minutes. Integrate your usersâ€™ authentic digital humans into apps, sites, and experiences with ease. - Our VR Showcase BETA App demonstrates the quality & features of a didimo that can be created from a single photo. - Our cloud-based platform gives businesses and developers the ability to create authentic avatars at speed and volume by integrating our API or using our Unity SDK with your application. Be sure to check out our Developer Portal to access the comprehensive resources we provide to help you build and transform your experiences with digital humans.
review_1: I didn't create a face (no thank you) but the two virtual faces were pretty detailed.
